itemizedlist.para: Start the &abbrev; configuration interface using one of the following methods.

listitem.para: Select Start Menu > Programs > syslog-ng Agent for Windows > Configure syslog-ng Agent.

Start MMC (for example, Start Menu > Windows Powershell, enter mmc), then select Add/Remove Snap-in > Available snap-ins > syslog-ng Agent. If .NET 3.5 is not installed, do not use this method on Windows 7, Windows Vista, and Windows 2008 Server platforms.
